Package neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.designstandards

Enum Class StandardType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<StandardType>
neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.designstandards.StandardType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<StandardType>, Constable
public enum StandardType extends Enum<StandardType>
Enumeration of supported international and industry design standards for mechanical design.

Each standard type includes metadata about its code, name, applicable equipment types, default version, and the design standard category it belongs to. Standards can be looked up by code or filtered by equipment type.

The design standard categories align with the existing NeqSim mechanical design framework:

  • pressure vessel design code - For pressure vessel wall thickness calculations
  • separator process design - For separator sizing
  • gas scrubber process design - For scrubber sizing
  • pipeline design codes - For pipeline wall thickness
  • compressor design codes - For compressor design
  • material plate design codes - For plate material selection
  • material pipe design codes - For pipe material selection
  • plate Joint Efficiency design codes - For weld joint efficiency
Version:
1.0
Author:
esol

      Parameters:

      name - the full name of the standard
      defaultVersion - the default version to use
      applicableEquipmentTypes - equipment types this standard applies to
      designStandardCategory - the NeqSim design standard category key

      public String getDesignStandardCategory()
      Get the NeqSim design standard category key.

      This corresponds to the keys used in MechanicalDesign.getDesignStandard() hashtable, such as "pressure vessel design code", "separator process design", "pipeline design codes".

      Returns:
      the design standard category key
